text: Yɨp mɨj ogɨnap kɨl tɨkñenɨmɨn, dad Juda apnan gɨpal kal keke mɨdeb taun Damaskus amnɨgayn agak. Amɨl, kɨlop ñɨnɨgayn agak. Mɨj anɨb ak tɨkɨl agɨnɨmɨn, Nɨbi Juda apnan gɨpal kal man Damaskus nɨb opɨm okok, binɨb Bɨawl kanɨb tep ne ameb apal ogɨnap yenɨgel, Sol nop agɨnɨmɨb agɨl tɨkɨnɨmɨn agak. Agem, nag lɨl, dad Jelusalem ownɨmuŋ agɨl tɨkɨnɨmɨn agak.
